original_text: Come to terms quickly with your accuser while you are going with him to court, lest your accuser hand you over to the judge, and the judge to the guard, and you be put in prison.
korean_text: 너를 고발하는 자와 함께 길에 있을 때에 급히 사화하라 그 고발하는 자가 너를 재판관에게 내어 주고 재판관이 옥리에게 내어 주어 옥에 가둘까 염려하라

sentences.original_text: Come to terms quickly with your accuser
while you are going with him to court
lest your accuser hand you over to the judge
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇지 않으면 고발하는 자가 너를 재판관에게 넘겨줄까 염려하라

sentences.original_text: and the judge to the guard
and you be put in prison
